abstract: Defense Dept says Iranian naval boats made perilous maneuvers around United States warships in Persian Gulf at least four times in recent days; it is uncertain whether actions were deliberate hostile efforts.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: American military officials reported four potentially dangerous episodes in the Gulf this week between United States and Iranian naval vessels.
snippet: American military officials reported four potentially dangerous episodes in the Gulf this week between United States and Iranian naval vessels....

headline.main: Tensions Rise Between Iran and U.S. in Persian Gulf
headline.print_headline: Iran Harasses U.S. Warships in Gulf, Pentagon Says
